text.author: Audrey Tang
text.title: 2018-11-06 Speech at Asia-Pacific Foundation of Canada in Toronto
text.summary: In a speech, the digital minister of Taiwan discusses the technological cooperation between private citizens and the national government to gather atmospheric and meteorological data as well as other projects with similar private and public partnerships.
